channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Alaska Man Monday: Leftovers and Fat Bears
House Republican plans to leave Congress after more than 2 decades in office
item.description: Rep. Michael McCaul, a Texas Republican who has served in the U.S. House of Representatives since 2005, will not seek re-election in 2026.

item.title: Newsday Apologizes for 'Insensitive' Kirk Political Cartoon
item.description: Newsday was forced to issue an apology over a "vile" and "insensitive" political cartoon concerning conservative leader Charlie Kirk's assassination.
